member.name: M:Vintasoft.Imaging.Web.Mvc.Controllers.VintasoftImageProcessingApiController.SaveProcessedImage(Vintasoft.Imaging.VintasoftImage,System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Saves processed image to a new file.
member.param: Processed image, which should be saved to a file.
URL of the source image file.
Zero-based page index in the source image file.
member.returns: URL to a file where processed image was saved.
member.remarks:
This method is executed each time when the processed image must be saved to a new file (.changeSource == true).
By default, this method saves the processed image to the folder with source image and adds "_processedX" prefix to a filename of processed image.
This method must be overriden if image saving algorithm must be changed.
